title: Ukrainian military says it hacked Russia's federal tax agency
description: ​The Ukrainian government's military intelligence service says it hacked the Russian Federal Taxation Service (FNS), wiping the agency's database and backup copies. [...]

title: Avira antivirus causes Windows computers to freeze after boot
description: Since Friday, Windows users have reported problems with the operating system freezing shortly after booting, an issue linked to a faulty update for Avira's security software. [...]

title: Microsoft December 2023 Patch Tuesday fixes 34 flaws, 1 zero-day
description: Today is Microsoft's December 2023 Patch Tuesday, which includes security updates for a total of 34 flaws and one previously disclosed, unpatched vulnerability in AMD CPUs. [...]

title: Windows 11 KB5033375 update released with upgraded Copilot AI-assistant
description: Microsoft has released the KB5033375 update for Windows 11 versions 23H2 and 22H2 to fix security vulnerabilities, upgrade Copilot for Windows, and make 36 changes and fixes [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5033372 update released with Copilot for everyone, 20 changes
description: Microsoft has released the KB5033372 cumulative update for Windows 10 21H2 and Windows 10 22H2, which includes Copilot for Windows and nineteen other changes to the operating system. [...]

title: Sophos backports RCE fix after attacks on unsupported firewalls
description: Sophos was forced to backport a security update for CVE-2022-3236 for end-of-life (EOL) firewall firmware versions after discovering hackers actively exploiting the flaw in attacks. [...]

title: Ukraine's largest mobile carrier Kyivstar down following cyberattack
description: Kyivstar, Ukraine's largest telecommunications service provider serving over 25 million mobile and home internet subscribers, has suffered a cyberattack impacting mobile and data services. [...]

title: Cloud engineer gets 2 years for wiping ex-employer’s code repos
description: Miklos Daniel Brody, a cloud engineer, was sentenced to two years in prison and a restitution of $529,000 for wiping the code repositories of his former employer in retaliation for being fired by the company.  [...]

title: Over 1,450 pfSense servers exposed to RCE attacks via bug chain
description: Roughly 1,450 pfSense instances exposed online are vulnerable to command injection and cross-site scripting flaws that, if chained, could enable attackers to perform remote code execution on the appliance. [...]
